description: Maps buying committee relationships and organizational structure for multi-threading strategy

buying_committee.name: Jane Smith
buying_committee.title: Chief Revenue Officer
buying_committee.engagement_history: Viewed our LinkedIn post in May 2024.

buying_committee.name: Carlos Ramirez
buying_committee.title: Director of Sales Enablement
buying_committee.engagement_history: Commented and liked our LinkedIn whitepaper; connected with AE.

buying_committee.name: Cathy Wu
buying_committee.title: SDR Manager
buying_committee.engagement_history: Liked 3 of our LinkedIn posts; registered for a webinar.

champions.name: Carlos Ramirez
champions.title: Director of Sales Enablement
champions.why_champion: Active on LinkedIn, engaged with content, benefits directly from enablement solutions.

champions.name: Cathy Wu
champions.title: SDR Manager
champions.why_champion: Engaged with posts/webinars; manages team of end-users who would utilize the tool.

multi_threading_strategy.reasoning: Company size is mid-market to enterprise, strong champion activity, decision maker moderately active on LinkedIn.

sequence.action: Outreach with enablement case study and invite for discovery call.
sequence.goal: Secure initial team interest and gather internal feedback.

sequence.action: Engage with tailored demo and ROI calculator.
sequence.goal: Build internal advocacy and uncover additional buying criteria.

sequence.action: Ask champion(s) to introduce us directly; frame business value and implementation plan.
sequence.goal: Secure executive sponsorship and move to proposal stage.

test_message_used: Analyze this sample data for testing
